description: Extension to Concentration driven scenario with similar end-of-century temperature impact to VLLO, but with less aggressive near-term mitigation and large reliance on net negative emissions, resulting in a higher overshoot.
name: Very Low Concentration Driven Scenario Extension after High Overshoot
experiment_description: Extension to Concentration driven scenario with similar end-of-century temperature impact to VLLO, but with less aggressive near-term mitigation and large reliance on net negative emissions, resulting in a higher overshoot.
